The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 09 November is 1,034,708 (1,838.3 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 04 November, there were 136,949 new confirmed cases (243.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 28 October, there were 127,820 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 7% ( 9,129 extra cases).
